title: The built up area for grant of D
clause_text: The built up area for grant of D.R.C. shall be equal to the built-up area of the sanctioned slum rehabilitation scheme, allowed to be taken in the form of Slum T.D.R.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
